name: Life Cycles
description:
Life Cycles is a game about the various cycles in life.

It is a very light hearted game, that invites the player to the reflection about life routines, responsabilities and the importance of leaving your legacy in the world.

The game was made during the 100 hours Extra Credits Game Jam with the theme Cycles.

Commands:
WASD -> Move

Mouse Left Click -> Attack
Mouse Right Click -> Interact/Pick Up

Store the food for your family. When your child is born he will start consuming the food. If the food ends, he will starve, so keep your eye on the food!
